desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes up to 5 strikes in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Hold down <IconNormal /> to charge up, increasing the power of the attack and dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.

desc.0: Press <IconEvade /> to activate:
desc.1: A quick dash dodge.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a dodge to activate:
desc.1: Slides forward, launching a series of strikes in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Strikes enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconSpecial /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes a series of strikes in front, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Hold down <IconSpecial /> to charge up, increasing its power.
desc.3: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

EXSpecialAttackThrillOfTheHunt.name: EX Special Attack: Thrill of the Hunt

desc.0: With enough Energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes a series of powerful strikes in front, dealing massive <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Hold down <IconSpecialReady /> to charge up, consuming Energy and enhancing the power of the attack.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes a series of powerful strikes at enemies in a small area in front of him, dealing massive <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When Decibel Rating is at <ct color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</ct>, press <IconUltimateReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes multiple powerful strikes at enemies in a large area, dealing massive <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the active character is launched, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Strikes enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
desc.2: This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</ct> when the character is under intense attacks.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> after a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Creates an icicle in front, which strikes all enemies within range, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

AssistFollowUpVengefulCounterattackGlaci.name: Assist Follow-Up: Vengeful Counterattack - Glacial Waltz

desc.0: Hold <IconNormal /> after a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Quickly launch multiple strikes against enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When Lycaon completes charging during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, or activates a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, the Daze inflicted by the skill increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>40%</ct>.
desc.1: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thrill of the Hunt</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Vengeful Counterattack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Vengeful Counterattack - Glacial Waltz</ct> hits an enemy, the target's <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice RES</ct> is reduced by 25%, and it increases the DMG to the target from other attributes by <ct color=#FFFFFF>30%</ct> for 30s.
desc.2: Upon entering the battlefield, Lycaon gains one <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> activation chance.
desc.3: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> has available activations, hitting an enemy with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Vengeful Counterattack - Glacial Waltz</ct> triggers the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> of the previous character in the squad. During this skill, when other squad members enter via <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct>, Lycaon enters the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> state for 8s.
desc.4: When an elite or boss enemy becomes Stunned, 1<ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> activation chance is gained. Up to 1 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> activation can be stored.
desc.5: When the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> state ends, Lycaon automatically activates <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Vengeful Counterattack - Glacial Waltz</ct>. If the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> state ends early, for every 1s of remaining duration, the Daze dealt by the next <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Vengeful Counterattack - Glacial Waltz</ct> increases by <ct color=#FFFFFF>6%</ct>.
desc.6: When the currently active character stops attacking or uses a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, Lycaon will end the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> state early.
desc.7: When Lycaon manually uses <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Vengeful Counterattack - Glacial Waltz</ct>, the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> state also ends early, but <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Vengeful Counterattack - Glacial Waltz</ct> will not be automatically triggered.
desc.8: While the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> state is active, Lycaon will activate <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct> based on the skills used by the currently active character.
desc.9: When the currently active character uses a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, Lycaon will simultaneously perform the 1st through 3rd hits of his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>.
desc.10: When the active character performs a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct>, Lycaon will simultaneously perform a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct>. After performing a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct> while in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> state, Lycaon can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>.
desc.11: While the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> state is active, when Lycaon is not the currently active Agent, his attacks only deal DMG and Daze. While Lycaon is the currently active character, the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> duration does not decrease.

desc.0: When Lycaon completes charging during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, or activates a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, the Daze inflicted by the skill increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>46.6%</ct>.

desc.10: When the active character performs a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct>, Lycaon will simultaneously perform a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct>. After performing a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct> while in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> state, Lycaon can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>.

If the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> state ends early, for every 1s of remaining duration, the Daze dealt by the next <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Vengeful Counterattack - Glacial Waltz</ct> increases by <ct color=#FFFFFF>6%</ct>.
desc.6: When the currently active character stops attacking or uses a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, Lycaon will end the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> state early.
desc.7: When Lycaon manually uses <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Vengeful Counterattack - Glacial Waltz</ct>, the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> state also ends early, but <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up: Vengeful Counterattack - Glacial Waltz</ct> will not be automatically triggered.
desc.8: While the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> state is active, Lycaon will activate <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct> based on the skills used by the currently active character.
desc.9: When the currently active character uses a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, Lycaon will simultaneously perform the 1st through 3rd hits of his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>.
desc.10: When the active character performs a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct>, Lycaon will simultaneously perform a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct>. After performing a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct> while in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> state, Lycaon can immediately follow up with the 3rd hit of his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>.
desc.11: While the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> state is active, when Lycaon is not the currently active Agent, his attacks only deal DMG and Daze. While Lycaon is the currently active character, the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> duration does not decrease.

desc.0: When another character in your squad is an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</ct> character or shares the same Attribute or Faction:
desc.1: When Lycaon hits a Stunned enemy, the target's Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 35%.

1.name: Full Moon Momentum
1.desc: When Lycaon's <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thrill of the Hunt</ct> hits an enemy, the attack's Daze increases by 12%. This effect can trigger once every 8s. When he charges his <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Thrill of the Hunt</ct> to completion, this buff will increase by an additional 10%.

flavor.0: Records suggest that werewolves exposed to moonlight become significantly more aggressive.

2.name: Energy Feedback
2.desc: When Stunning an enemy or triggering a squad member's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, Lycaon gains 5 Energy. Can trigger once every 1s.

flavor.0: "Canines receive a brief dopamine boost in their brains after completing semi-complex tasks. At that moment, if their owner pets them to show encouragement, they will be extremely happy..."
flavor.1: â€”Excerpt from the "Handbook of Unreliable Canine Research"

3.name: Attendant Training
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
3.flavor: His every gesture exudes poise, and his words and actions are as refreshing as a spring breeze. An attendant's training is about maintaining control over everything.

4.name: Graceful Demeanor

desc.0: If Lycaon is attacked while using a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, he will immediately gain a Shield equal to 7.5% of his Max HP, lasting for 15s.
desc.1: During the Shield's duration, his Anti-Interrupt level is increased. This effect can trigger once every 15s.

4.flavor: "An outstanding attendant maintains a graceful demeanor at any and all times."

5.name: Alpha Nature
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
5.flavor: His glance harbors a primal ferocity, and the echoes of his howls rumble within his throat. Regardless of his current gracefulness, underneath the formal wear, he's still untamed.

6.name: Ruthless Hunter
6.desc: When a charged attack hits an enemy, the target suffers 10% increased DMG from Lycaon, stacking up to 5 times and lasting 12s. Only one stack can be gained per skill use, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

flavor.0: "Apologies, but given the circumstances, I will not show any mercy."
flavor.1: "After all, if a fair fight is what you are after, a Hollow is not the place to look for it."

potential.name: Potential Awakening: Glacial Rush
desc: While <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> is active, when Lycaon performs a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct> as a non-active Agent, his Impact is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>5%</ct>.

While <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> is active, when Lycaon performs a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct> as a non-active Agent, his Impact is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>7.5%</ct>.

While <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> is active, when Lycaon performs a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct> as a non-active Agent, his Impact is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>10%</ct>.

While <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> is active, when Lycaon performs a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct> as a non-active Agent, his Impact is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>12.5%</ct>.

While <ct color=#FFFFFF>Encircle Prey</ct> is active, when Lycaon performs a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct> as a non-active Agent, his Impact is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>15%</ct>.
